name: The Celestial Atlas
description: An ancient, leather-bound tome adorned with intricate star charts and celestial maps, whose pages shimmer with a soft, stardust-like quality. It is said to reveal hidden patterns and secrets of the cosmos to those who study it.

name: The Whispering Scepter
description: A delicate, crystal-tipped scepter etched with strange symbols that seem to whisper secrets to its user. Its gentle hum resonates in harmony with the library's slumbering energies, as if attuned to unlock hidden knowledge within the shelves.
